de.iss.mv2.client.io

Class MV2Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.client.io.MV2Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommunicationPartner

    public class MV2Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommunicationPartner
    A client to connect to a MV2-Server.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer
